column4: I can't get my wife's PC to login, she's on Feisty with a Nvidia 6800gt, I get an xsession error which changes just about every time.  Ususaly it ends with Xsession: Beginning Session setup
it keeps saying session lasted less then 10 seconds.
delete her home directory as root, unless if it contains something important... if it does, chown it all to her for sure. then retry
